title: Pair of Moccasins
description: beaded on top of foot and around heel; geometric bars and triangles; blue ground on tops of feet with white border
creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund and gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
